comments.author: Marcel Reutegger
comments.body: I'd rather not keep the string representation in asString. The method toString() is only used for debugging, right? Which means there is no need to make it quick for frequent calls.

comments.author: Michael Dürig
comments.body: That's fine with me. Do you need me to update the patch?

comments.author: Marcel Reutegger
comments.body: Committed a changed version of the patch where the string is not held as local variable. svn revision: 732678

description: This would simplify logging and debugging.
